thread.title: Quiet, sophisticated comfort at the heart of a big city
thread.title_full: Quiet, sophisticated comfort at the heart of a big city - Review of HGU New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Charles2988
title: Quiet, sophisticated comfort at the heart of a big city
text:
Looking for a cozy well appointed hotel at the heart of NYC, well look no further! Located in the shadow of NYC's most iconic skyscraper the Empire State Building and only a 15 min walk to Times Square this hotel is perfectly located. Obviously recently renovated; this hotel oozes boho chic (although the bar decor is not to my taste and probably not overly family friendly - but hey, it's a bar after all?!) Warm, welcoming staff and small but perfectly appointed rooms.
Room Tip: Try and get a room on 42nd S - you will get a view of the Empire State Bld from the window See more room tips
